params._signature: The order's signature. Should be signed by _order.maker

params._orderHash: An order's hash to fetch the underlying order

returns.order: The order that corresponds to the _orderHash

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

OrderBroadcasted(address,bytes32).notice: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted

broadcastOrder((uint256,address,address,.notice: Broadcast a limit order with its signature

fee().notice: Fee in bps for broadcasting an order

limitOrderProtocol().notice: The limit order protocol this orderbook references

signatures(bytes32).notice: Mapping from order hash to an Order's signature
